PerfectNetExp.abs: ...情，直接就冲着正确答案“扑”过去了，因为题干和答案都在老师总结的“衰老健壮”词条中，没有做错的理由。题干是衰老（decrepitude），选择答案E，健壮（sturdiness）。词条中，表示衰弱的词还有infirm, feeble.

entry.tran: 破旧;年久失修;衰老;老朽
entry.def: Decrepitude is the state of being very old and in poor condition.

example.ex: The building had a general air of decrepitude and neglect.
example.tran: 这座建筑看上去破旧失修，无人照管。

means.word_mean: 1. a state of deterioration due to old age or long use
